articles.title: Shortage of Schengen Visa interview slots likely to impact your Europe travel plans - The Times of India
articles.description: If reports are to go by, this surge reflects a 44% increase in visa applications for Schengen countries, including those from India. In the past year alone, Schengen visa applications from India rose from 6.7 lakh in 2022 to 9.7 lakh.
articles.content: As the summer holiday season takes off, an increasing number of Indian travellers are encountering challenges in obtaining Schengen visas, given the surge in demand for travel to Europe in 2024. Repo… [+2619 chars]
